alert.note: Alert for Athens; Morgan; Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 10:11AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Washington, southeastern Morgan and southeastern Athens Counties through 1045 AM EST... At 1010 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Coolville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marietta, Beverly, Lowell, Bartlett, Fleming and Devola. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 3 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
